de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Interface IGuiElementChanges

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationController

    public interface IGuiElementChanges
    Interface to inform the ApplicationController about changes to an IGuiElement in an IGuiModel.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • placeAddedToCurrentGuiModel

        void placeAddedToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                                 java.awt.Point position)
        Callback for the IGuiModelController to get the IDataModelController up-to-date after adding a IGuiPlace.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the added place
        name - The name of the added place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of the added place
        position - The position of the added place

      • transitionAddedToCurrentGuiModel

        void transitionAddedToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.awt.Point position)
        Callback for the IGuiModelController to get the IDataModelController up-to-date after adding a IGuiTransition.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the added transition
        name - The name of the added transition
        position - The position of the added transition

      • arcAddedToCurrentGuiModel

        void arcAddedToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String sourceId,
                               java.lang.String targetId)
        Callback for the IGuiModelController to get the IDataModelController up-to-date after adding a IGuiArc.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the added arc
        sourceId - The source ID for the added arc
        targetId - The target ID for the added arc

      • guiElementRemoved

        void guiElementRemoved(java.lang.String elementId)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to remove an IDataElement from the IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        elementId - The ID of the removed IGuiElement

      • guiNodeRenamed

        void guiNodeRenamed(java.lang.String nodeId,
                    java.lang.String newName)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to rename an IDataNode in the IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The ID of the renamed IGuiNode
        newName - The new name

      • guiNodeDragged

        void guiNodeDragged(java.lang.String nodeId,
                    java.awt.Point newPosition)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the position of an IDataNode in the IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The ID of the dragged IGuiNode
        newPosition - The new position

      • guiTransitionFired

        void guiTransitionFired(java.lang.String transitionId)
        Handles the IGuiModelController info that the specified IGuiTransition has been fired.

        Note: This refers to the current model (active file).
        Parameters:
        transitionId - The ID of the fired IGuiTransition

      • enableZValueActions

        void enableZValueActions(IGuiElement element)
        Passes the request to update the "enabled" state of appropriate AbstractAction to the IActionManager. This refers to Actions which depend on the currently selected element or the element at the popup menu location.
        Parameters:
        element - The IGuiElement that is currently selected or at the popup menu location, or null = no element selected and no element at the popup menu location

      • getCurrentMinZValue

        int getCurrentMinZValue()
        Callback for the IActionManager
        Returns:
        the minimum z value from the current IGuiModel

      • getCurrentMaxZValue

        int getCurrentMaxZValue()
        Callback for the IActionManager
        Returns:
        the maximum z value from the current IGuiModel

      • enableActionsForSelectedElements

        void enableActionsForSelectedElements(java.util.List<IGuiElement> selected)
        Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on the number of selected IGuiElement.

        Note: Callback for the IGuiModelController, passes the request to the ActionManager.
        Parameters:
        selected - The List of selected IGuiElement
